GSP33ramvaspu:695_4: anyonyasaṃsṛṣṭaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jagad vidhāya svayam api sarvasyātmatayā praviśya paramātmatvenāvasthitaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:695_5: sarvaśarīraṃ bahuprakāram avatiṣṭhate / yad idaṃ mahābhūtasūkṣmaṃ vastu tad eva prakṛtiśabdenābhidhīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:695_6: bhoktṛvargasamūha eva puruṣaśabdena cocyate / tau ca prakṛtipuruṣau paramātmaśarīratayā
GSP33ramvaspu:695_8: 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti tatsṛṣṭvā tad evānupraviśat tad anupraviśya sac ca
GSP33ramvaspu:695_9: tyac cābhavan niruktaṃ cāniruktaṃ ca nilayanaṃ cānilayanaṃ ca vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:695_10: ca satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca satyam abhavad iti pūrvoktaṃ sarvam anayaiva śrutyā vyaktam /
GSP33ramvaspu:697_1: evetyuktam / bhaktiśabdaś ca prītiviśeṣe vartate / prītiś ca jñānaviśeṣa eva / nanu
GSP33ramvaspu:697_2: ca sukhaṃ prītir ityanarthāntaram / sukhaṃ ca jñānaviśeṣasādhyaṃ padārthāntaram iti
GSP33ramvaspu:697_3: hi laukikāḥ / naivam / yena jñānaviśeṣeṇa tatsādhyam ity ucyate sa eva jñānaviśeṣaḥ sukham /
GSP33ramvaspu:699_0: etad uktaṃ bhavati viṣayajñānāni sukhaduḥkhamadhyasādhāraṇāni / tāni ca viṣayādhīnaviśeṣāṇi
GSP33ramvaspu:699_1: tathā bhavanti / yena ca viṣayaviśeṣeṇa viśeṣitaṃ jñānaṃ sukhasya janakam ity abhimataṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:700_0: tadatireki padārthāntaraṃ nopalabhyate / tenaiva sukhitvavyavahāropapatteś ca / evaṃvidhasukhasvarūpajñānasya
GSP33ramvaspu:700_1: viśeṣakatvaṃ brahmavyatiriktasya vastunaḥ sātiśayam asthiraṃ ca / brahmaṇas tv anavadhikātiśayaṃ
GSP33ramvaspu:700_2: sthiraṃ ceti / ānando brahmety ucyate / viṣayāyattatvāj jñānasya sukhasvarūpatayā
GSP33ramvaspu:700_3: brahmaiva sukham / tad idam āha raso vai saḥ rasaṃ he evāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavatīti
GSP33ramvaspu:700_4: brahmaiva sukham iti brahma labdhvā sukhī bhavatītyarthaḥ / paramapuruṣaḥ svenaiva
GSP33ramvaspu:700_5: svayam anavadhikātiśayasukhaḥ san parasyāpi sukhaṃ bhavati / sukhasvarūpatvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33ramvaspu:700_6: brahma yasya jñānaviṣayo bhavati sa sukhī bhavatītyarthaḥ / tad evaṃ parasya brahmaṇo
GSP33ramvaspu:702: nanu cātyantaśeṣataivātmano 'navadhikātiśayasukham ityuktaṃ bhavati / tad etat sarvalokaviruddham / tathā hi sarveṣām eva cetanānāṃ svātantryam eva iṣṭatamaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33ramvaspu:704: sarvaṃ paravaśam duḥkhaṃ sarvam ātmavaśaṃ sukham /
GSP33ramvaspu:706: sevā śvavṛttir ākhyātā tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet /
GSP33ramvaspu:707_0: iti / tad idam anadhigatadehātiriktātmarūpāṇāṃ śarīrātmābhimānavijṛmbhitam / tathā
GSP33ramvaspu:707_1: hi śarīraṃ hi manuṣyatvādijātiguṇāśrayapiṇḍabhūtaṃ svatantraṃ pratīyate / tasminn
GSP33ramvaspu:707_2: evāham iti saṃsāriṇāṃ pratītiḥ / ātmābhimāno yādṛśas tadanuguṇaiva puruṣārthapratītiḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:707_4: sukhāni vyavasthitāni / tāni ca parasparaviruddhāni / tasmād ātmābhimānānuguṇapuruṣārthavyavasthayā
GSP33ramvaspu:707_5: sarvaṃ samāhitam / ātmasvarūpaṃ tu devādidehavilakṣaṇaṃ jñānaikākāram / tac ca paraśeṣataikasvarūpam /
GSP33ramvaspu:707_6: yathāvasthitātmābhimāne tadanuguṇaiva puruṣārthapratītiḥ / ātmā jñānamayo 'mala iti
GSP33ramvaspu:707_7: smṛter jñānaikākāratā pratipannā / patiṃ viśvasyetyādi śrutiguṇaiḥ paramātmaśeṣataikākāratā
GSP33ramvaspu:707_8: ca pratītā / ataḥ siṃhavyāghrādiśarīrātmābhimānavat svātantryābhimāno 'pi karmakṛtaviparītātmajñānarūpo
GSP33ramvaspu:707_9: veditavyaḥ / ataḥ karmakṛtam eva paramapuruṣavyatiriktaviṣayāṇāṃ sukhatvam / ata
GSP33ramvaspu:707_10: eva teṣām alpatvam asthiratvaṃ ca paramapuruṣasyaiva svata eva sukhatvam / atas tad
GSP33ramvaspu:707_11: eva sthiram anavadhikātiśayaṃ ca kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma ānando brahma satyaṃ jñānam
GSP33ramvaspu:707_12: anantaṃ brahmeti śruteḥ / brahmavyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya vastunaḥ svarūpeṇa sukhatvābhāvaḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:709: vastv ekam eva duḥkhāya sukhāyerṣyāgamāya ca /
GSP33ramvaspu:710: kopāya ca yatas tasmād vastu vastvātmakaṃ kutaḥ //
GSP33ramvaspu:711: sukhaduḥkhādyekāntarūpiṇo vastuno vastutvaṃ kutaḥ / tadekāntatā puṇyapāpakṛtetyarthaḥ / evam anekapuruṣāpekṣayā kasyacit sukham eva kasyacid duḥkhaṃ bhavatītyavasthāṃ pratipādya,
GSP33ramvaspu:712: ekasminn api puruṣe na vyavasthitam ityāha
GSP33ramvaspu:713: tad eva prīyate bhūtvā punarsuḥkhāya jāyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:714: tad eva kopāya yataḥ prasādāya ca jāyate //
GSP33ramvaspu:715: tasmād duḥkhātmakaṃ nāsti na ca kiṃcit sukhātmakam /
GSP33ramvaspu:716: iti sukhaduḥkhātmakatvaṃ sarvasya vastunaḥ karmakṛtaṃ na vastusvarūpakṛtam / ataḥ karmāvasāne tad apaitītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:718_0: yat tu sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥkham ityuktaṃ tatparamapuruṣavyatiriktānāṃ parasparaśeṣaśeṣibhāvābhāvāt
GSP33ramvaspu:718_1: tadvyatiriktaṃ prati śeṣatā duḥkham evetyuktam / sevā śvavṛttir ākhyātety atrāpy
GSP33ramvaspu:718_2: asevyasevā śvavṛttir evetyuktam / sa hy āśramaiḥ sadopāsyaḥ samastair eka eva tv
GSP33ramvaspu:718_3: iti sarvair ātmayāthātmyavedibhiḥ sevyaḥ puruṣottama eka eva / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā
GSP33ramvaspu:721_0: itīyam eva bhaktirūpā sevā brahmavid āpnoti param tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati
GSP33ramvaspu:721_1: brahma veda brahmaiva bhavatītyādiṣu vedanaśabdenābhidhīyata ityuktam / yam evaiṣa
GSP33ramvaspu:721_2: vṛṇute tena labhya iti viśeṣaṇād yam evaiṣa vṛṇuta iti bhavagatā varaṇīyatvaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33ramvaspu:721_3: varaṇīyaś ca priyatamaḥ / yasya bhagavaty anavadhikātiśayā prītir jāyate sa eva bhagavataḥ
GSP33ramvaspu:722: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ /
GSP33ramvaspu:723: iti / tasmāt parabhaktirūpāpannam eva vedanaṃ tattvato bhagavatprāptisādhanam / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā dvaipāyanena mokṣadharme sarvopaniṣadvyākhyānarūpam
GSP33ramvaspu:724: na saṃdṛśo tiṣṭhati rūpam asya na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaścanainam /
GSP33ramvaspu:725: bhaktyā ca dhṛtyā ca samāhitātmā jñānasvarūpaṃ paripaśyatītīha //
GSP33ramvaspu:726: dhṛtyā samāhitātmā bhaktyā puruṣottamaṃ paśyati sākṣātkaroti prāpnotītyarthaḥ / bhaktyā tv anannyayā śakya ityanenāikārthyāt / bhaktiś ca jñānaviśeṣa eveti sarvam upapannam /
